ValidationRule.description: This Validation Rule informs users of the blank fields they must complete prior to updating a Rejects Case to Closed Status.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(ISPICKVAL(NS_InteractionReason__c,'Rejects') , ISPICKVAL(Status,'NS_Closed') , NS_Created_using_Quick_Case__c <> True,
OR( ISBLANK(NS_CustomerContactNotifiedOfResolution__c) , ISBLANK(NS_CustomerNotifiedDateTime__c) , ISBLANK(NS_NewWaybill__c) , ISBLANK(NS_ReasonForReject__c) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please complete Customer Contact Notified, Date Customer Notified, New Waybill, and Reason for Reject prior to closing the Case.
